mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as totalRecord FROM tag t WHERE t.name = #{name}
SELECT * FROM tag t ORDER BY t.name ASC
SELECT t.* FROM tag_site_map ts LEFT JOIN tag t ON t.id = ts.id_tag WHERE ts.id_site = #{id_site} ORDER BY t.name ASC
SELECT t.* FROM tag_device_map ts LEFT JOIN tag t ON t.id = ts.id_tag WHERE ts.id_device = #{id_device} ORDER BY t.name ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `tag_site_map` WHERE id_tag = #{id} AND id_site = #{id_site}
DELETE FROM `tag_device_map` WHERE id_tag = #{id} AND id_device = #{id_device}
